section.name: Publications about Mod4j
section.p: On a regular basis the Mod4j project team gives presentations or write papers about various aspects of Mod4j and the underlying concepts. This page provides links to downloads of these publications.

ol.li: Article Model Driven Development met Mod4j by Eric Jan Malotaux, published in Java Magazine 2009/3, June 2009. In Dutch.
Presentation Mod4j: Modeling for java by Jos Warmer, keynote session at J-Spring 2009, the Dutch Java Users group (NLJUG) conference. Slides are in english.

Presentation on CrossX Large Models - An Alternative Approach by Jos Warmer for the Modeling Symposium at the Eclipse Summit Europe 2008. CrossX is the inter-dsl communication technology used my Mod4j and contributed to the Eclipse EMF Index project.
Paper on CrossX Large Models - An Alternative Approach by Jos Warmer for the Modeling Symposium at the Eclipse Summit Europe 2008. More detailed background that the presentation above.
